description: CISCO IP PHONE OR EQUIVALENT FOR 3 YEARS WITH DELIVERY BEFORE MARCH 31, 2023
tags: Services included: IP Phone, power cord, backup power transformer and Smart Licenses.
full_summary:
### Government Tenders Announcement: Cisco IP Phone or Equivalent

#### **RFP Document Details**

| RFP Reference Information | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Title | Cisco IP Phone or Equivalent |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01009988 |
| Date of Publication | 2022-10-17 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2022-11-01T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Number | 2 |
| Solicitation Number | BPM017133A |

#### **Project Overview**

This bid solicitation is issued to satisfy the requirement for the supply and delivery of 350 Cisco IP Phones or equivalent by Shared Services Canada (SSC) for a period of three years.

The successful supplier will deliver the necessary goods, including:

* Cisco IP Phone 8865 No Radio variant
* Power Cord, North America
* IP Phone power transformer for the 8800 phone series
* Collaboration Flex Plan 3.0
* Basic Support for Flex Plan
* NU On-Premises Calling Enhanced
* SRST Endpoints
* Enhanced Smart License
* Emergency Responder Smart License
* File Storage Entitlement
* Pro Pack for Cisco Control Hub Entitlement
* Messaging Named User Entitlement
* Version 11x License Entitlement

#### **Security and Trade Requirements**

* This solicitation does not contain security requirements, but all the goods and services shall be delivered in regions not covered by Land Claim Agreements.
* This requirement is subject to the following agreements:
	+ Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### **Submission Guidelines**

* All bidders must register and log in to the P2P portal to submit a response.
* Bidders can view RFQ documents within the P2P tool in the solicitation: BPM017133A
* Queries and emails to be submitted to: Eric Vanasse, Senior Procurement Officer at Shared Services Canada ([Eric.Vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Eric.Vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca))

#### **Evaluation Criteria**

Please refer to Anne A – List of Deliverables and Prices for more information.

[Please retrieve attachments from](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/5fa7d464bb1af9b5a20f614f42d
